answers.answer: Hair naturally grows on every inch of your body. It's how the human body was made to regulate heat and keep warm. If it bothers you, shave or wax. PCOS is determined by a doctor. What makes you think you have it?

well i read an article about it and scince i have diabetes and hair growth in wierd places i thought i had it but im a type 1 diabetic so i dont know if that makes a difference. maybe im just paranoid.
It might be. But there are a lot of other things that are part of PCOS, the most common being lack of ovulation, irregular periods or no periods.

title: Hair on my chest and stomach?
